snippet: Companies are paying more attention to the impact of business travel on their total carbon footprint, and many are implementing new policies that range from encouraging the use of videoconferencing to charging carbon fees.
abstract: Corporations have been focusing on business travel as area in which they can reduce expenses and their carbon footprint, opting to use digital conferencing technologies to replace some face-to-face meetings; companies hope that putting greener travel policies in place may appeal to younger generation of environmentally knowledgeable employees and recruits, and would burnish their brands.
lead_paragraph: Companies are paying more attention to the impact of business travel on their total carbon footprint, and many are implementing new policies that range from encouraging the use of videoconferencing to charging carbon fees.

headline.main: The Greening of Business Travel Gains Momentum
